CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 17, 1959, pg. 1, reads: "Family Mourners - Araminta Godfrey, front row, center one of the surviving daughters of 'Ma Pitts,' is escorted by Tom West Jr., left, and Gus Pritchard as she leaves Wesley Center AME Zion Church after burial rites were held for her mother. in second row are Charles (Snooks) Godfrey, oldest son of the deceased, and his wife, Mrs. Juanita Godfrey.  In the rear are Lawrence Mitchell, husband of Mrs. Erin Mitchell, youngest curviving daughter of 'Ma Pitts' - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Tom West Jr., and Gus Pritchard wearing plaid coat, leading Araminta Godfrey out of Wesley Center AME Zion Church, with Charles "Snooks" Godfrey and Juanita Godfrey behind them, and Lawrence Mitchell and Erin Mitchell in background, for funeral of Erin "Ma Pitts" Godfrey
